alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 10:27PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH STRONG WINDS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN STILLWATER... SOUTHWESTERN CARBON...SOUTHWESTERN SWEET GRASS AND EAST CENTRAL PARK COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM MDT... At 1024 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 23 miles southeast of Livingston to 26 miles southwest of Absarokee to 10 miles east of Cooke City. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts OF 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Roads along the foothills may be impacted by sudden cross winds. This includes highways 212 and 78 near Red Lodge. Locations impacted include... Red Lodge, Bearcreek, Mystic Lake, Belfry, Fishtail, Alpine, Roberts, Dean, Fox, Washoe, Nye, Roscoe, and Luther. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon
